transportAdvice: The historic Old Town and main attractions are compact and best explored on foot, with the famous Stari Most bridge and bazaar area easily walkable. Taxis are widely available for reaching areas outside the center, and local buses connect Mostar to surrounding towns, though tourist sites are generally within walking distance.
